task: Fix artist disambiguation for Last.fm lookups
message: Fixed the 'wrong Andrew Weiss' bug. When viewing an artist from the graph (like Andrew Weiss of Butthole Surfers), the detail panel was showing albums/images for a different Andrew Weiss because Last.fm was searched by name. Now uses MBID for accurate lookups. Production live with commit 5de1560.

deployed_changes.summary: Fix artist disambiguation: use MBID for Last.fm lookups
features: Last.fm artist.getinfo now uses MBID parameter when available
Last.fm artist.gettopalbums now uses MBID parameter when available
Safari/Brave dark mode toggle fix from earlier session

key_decisions: Pass MBID to Last.fm API calls instead of just artist name
Cache keys now include MBID for more accurate caching
Discogs still uses name search (no MBID support) but is fallback only
context.testing_done: Build successful, deployed to production, health check passed

notes: SPOTIFY REDIRECT ISSUE: Use http://127.0.0.1:3000 instead of http://localhost:3000. User should clear browser cache/localStorage to test the Andrew Weiss fix (old cached data may persist).
